title: Reusing Deep Neural Network Models through Model Re-engineering. (arXiv:2304.00245v1 [cs.SE])
abstract: Training deep neural network (DNN) models, which has become an important task in today's software development, is often costly in terms of computational resources and time. With the inspiration of software reuse, building DNN models through reusing existing ones has gained increasing attention recently.
